message:
Serious post now. While we didn't hit our goal in order for the fireseeds to jump in the river, that doesn't matter. What matters most to us fireseeds, is that if you have any ounce of desire to go, follow that desire. Some of us have gone before and know how God can hit you so hard at this conference, and open your eyes to His plan for the next few months, the summer, and for years to come. I can attest to that. 

TCX is an incredible opportunity for growth and to finally dive into meeting numerous people from our campuses and the Upper Midwest. It's where I finally felt apart of the community Cru has to offer. 

Please pray about coming to this conference. We'll be in touch with some of you within the next week or so, but feel free to talk to anyone of us if you have any questions or concerns. 

If money is an issue, email Brad at brad.gustafson@cru.org. We don't want money to be a reason to not go, so we'll help out financially the best we can.

Sorry for all the posts today! I just am so excited for TCX and to grow alongside all of YOU!
